page.title: 16 Corpach: Housing
page.content: {Housing and the Pulp and Paper Mill} There is little in the way of houses within the survey block. However, what there is divides nicely into four groups. At the west of the survey area is council housing built originally to accomodate workers of the Pulp and Paper Mill built in the early 60's. Further east and separate from the council houses are executive houses built originally for the Pulp and Paper Mill management. With the closure of the Pulp section and the streamlining of the Paper Mill, much of the workforce has since left the area and these houses are now much sought after by the residents of nearby Fort William.
